segments.text: This room is unacceptable . I want a new one , and I want a refund for tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you please tell me the exact problem , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm being attacked by hordes of cockroaches !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my gosh , they're back ? Another room at once , sir , plus a full refund , of course .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much . This has been a most unsettling experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , our guests are our reason for being .
segments.speaker: S2
